snippet: The new government is made up of five factions with somewhat contradictory positions on critical questions including the Palestinian conflict.
abstract: Israeli political leaders sign agreements to form new government that will almost certainly complicate prospect of jump-starting moribund peace process, as well as focus attention on economy and widen rift between ultra-Orthodox and more secular communities.
lead_paragraph: The new government is made up of five factions with somewhat contradictory positions on critical questions including the Palestinian conflict.

headline.main: Israelis Form Government Days Before Obama Visit
headline.print_headline: Israelis Form Government Days Before Obama Visit
